snippet: The American base in Djibouti, Camp Lemonnier, has served as a hub for counterterrorism operations and training.
abstract: Obama administration says it has signed a 20-year lease on its military base in Djibouti in the Horn of Africa; base is the only American installation on the continent and staging ground for counterterrorism operations in Yemen and Somalia.

byline.contributor: Michael R. Gordon contributed reporting from Luanda, Angola.

lead_paragraph: The American base in Djibouti, Camp Lemonnier, has served as a hub for counterterrorism operations and training.

headline.main: U.S. Signs New Lease to Keep Strategic Military Installation in the Horn of Africa
